select board_no as no, board_name as name, board_description as description, board_seq as seq, board_read_option as readOption, board_write_option as writeOption, board_deleted as deleted, board_created_date as createdDate, board_updated_date as updatedDate, board_deleted_date as deletedDate, nvl(parent_board_no, -1) as parentBoardNo from comm_boards where board_no = #value#
